title: Divine Emerald and Diamond Vaddanam Haaram - Timeless Elegance
materials: Good Cut). Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: Intricately designed floral and paisley motifs set with dazzling diamonds and vibrant green emeralds. The Vaddanam-style pendant features a heart-shaped design with delicate gold drops, adding a modern touch to the traditional Haaram. The necklace showcases a classic leaf pattern interspersed with floral Emerald and Diamond clusters.
occasions: and significant cultural events. A statement piece suitable for half-saree functions
and other festive celebrations. Can also elevate modern formal attire.
description: Exquisite craftsmanship from skilled artisans, blending traditional Haaram design with a contemporary Vaddanam pendant for a unique look. The combination of high-quality diamonds and emeralds creates a luxurious and timeless piece. Its cultural significance and elegant design make it a treasured heirloom.
